## SocketIoBooter.load() method

Uses super method to get a list of Artifact classes. Boot each class by binding it to the application using `app.controller(controller);`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
load(): Promise<void>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
